Sentencas: Two different nanosized materials were synthesized by two preparation methods, namely a sonochemical technique and a spray pyrolysis process.
Titulo: Materials synthesis and characterization of 8YSZ nanomaterials for the fabrication of electrolyte membranes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The powder properties, the sintering behavior and the resulting crystallinity with respect to their utilisation for solid oxide fuel cell electrolytes were investigated.
Titulo: Materials synthesis and characterization of 8YSZ nanomaterials for the fabrication of electrolyte membranes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: While the spray pyrolysis provides crystallized powder without any organic residue, the sonochemical powder is amorphous with some organic residue.
Titulo: Materials synthesis and characterization of 8YSZ nanomaterials for the fabrication of electrolyte membranes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Crystallization begins in the 400-500 degreesC temperature domain.
Titulo: Materials synthesis and characterization of 8YSZ nanomaterials for the fabrication of electrolyte membranes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The particle sizes vary between 10 and 50 nm for the sonochemical powder and between 50 nm and 1 mum for the spray pyrolysis powder, as determined by SEM analyses.
Titulo: Materials synthesis and characterization of 8YSZ nanomaterials for the fabrication of electrolyte membranes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Crystal growth of both powders starts between 800 and 1000 degreesC. After heating and sintering at 1300 degreesC the resulting grain sizes of the spray pyrolysis powder are 5 times larger than those of the sonochemical powder (about 250 nm and 1.2 mum, respectively).
Titulo: Materials synthesis and characterization of 8YSZ nanomaterials for the fabrication of electrolyte membranes in solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Additionally, the maximum rate of grain growth for the spray-pyrolysed material at 97 nm/h is even higher compared with 22 nm/h for the sonochemical powder.
Titulo: Materials synthesis and characterization of 8YSZ nanomaterials for the fabrication of electrolyte membranes in solid oxide fuel cells
